title: I'm running out of Mid Laners for Solo Queue D;
body:
When I play 5s and stuff, I love playing all kinds of mid laners, and I mainly play what the team needs me to play.

But in solo queue, I'm quite picky with my mids. I like champions who are strong laners, have good teamfight, have cc (not necessary) and most importantly, can fend for themself and make solo plays, not needing to rely on other champions to get myself fed or to get myself out alive.

This used to consist of Ahri, Liss, Syndra, Fizz and Talon (Basically only when I have AP Damage elsewhere). 

After, the Fizz changes, he's dropped out my list. Syndra is a lot weaker now, not quite the laner she used to be, and her stun is a fair bit harder to hit but I guess I could still fall back on her. And now my favourite Mid laner just got nerfed, Lissandra. Haven't played her yet so not sure how she'll be but if she's just no where near as good as she used to be, who do I have left?

Ahri and Talon? lolol. Could you guys suggest some mid laners who fit my criteria? Ty ty

Fizz does output more damage now if you combo correctly, but old Fizz didn't NEED to. You could start with any ability you wanted to, and still have enough damage to kill any champion you wanted to. Often you weren't in a good spot to start with Chum the Waters, and if that was the case with new Fizz, you'd lose all your damage. AD Fizz is strong, but not as strong as old AP FIzz.
